directions: [["Combine ricotta, eggs, and basil in a bowl and stir well. In a separate large bowl, combine pasta sauce and tomato sauce."],["Grease inside of a large slow cooker."],["Add a few cups of the pasta sauce to the bottom of the slow cooker and add approximately half a cup of uncooked pasta. Dot on half of the ricotta mixture and spread out evenly. Add half of the parmesan cheese."],["Repeat step 3 until a total of 3 layers have been made. Reserve approximately 2 cups of sauce to put on top and cover all of the pasta."],["Cover and cook on high 2-3 hours. "],["During the last few minutes, add asiago cheese (or mozzarella) to the top and melt. Serve with red pepper flakes and garlic bread."],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
ingredients: [{"number":["2"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Jars of pasta sauce (25 oz each)"]},{"number":["15"],"units":["Ounces(s)"],"name":["Tomato sauce"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Pound(s)"],"name":["Penne pasta, uncooked"]},{"number":["15"],"units":["Ounces(s)"],"name":["Ricotta cheese"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Eggs"]},{"number":["1/3"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Chopped basil"]},{"number":["2"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Freshly grated parmesan cheese"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Grated asiago cheese (or shredded mozzarella)"]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""]}]
